dmca.title: PF - trpery.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx
<http://www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx> 

 

Legal Response Team


________________________________

From: Admin [mailto:area52@bellsouth.net] 
Posted At: Tuesday, October 03, 2006 7:58 AM
Posted To: DMCA Houston
Conversation: PF - trpery.com
Subject: RE: PF - trpery.com



Well I highly recommend you get an attorney to explain it to you.

 

 

-----Original Message-----
From: TSBC Industries - CEO [mailto:ceo@tsbcindustries.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, October 03, 2006 8:12 AM
To: Admin
Subject: Re: PF - trpery.com

 

This notice explains nothing....

        ----- Original Message ----- 

        From: Admin <mailto:area52@bellsouth.net>  

        To: Ev1 Dmca <mailto:dmca@ev1.net>  ; nugezpa3@yahoo.com ; 
ceo@tsbcindustries.com 

        Cc: support@phil-flash.com ; 'Erin' <mailto:erin@phil-flash.com>


        Sent: Monday, October 02, 2006 6:10 PM

        Subject: RE: PF - trpery.com

         

         

         

        -----Original Message-----
        From: Admin [mailto:area52@bellsouth.net]

        To: Ev1 Dmca (dmca@ev1.net); 'nugezpa3@yahoo.com'
        Cc: (support@phil-flash.com); 'Erin'
        Subject: RE: PF - trpery.com

         

         

         

        -----Original Message-----
        From: Admin [mailto:area52@bellsouth.net]

        To: (chrisn@ev1servers.net); Ev1 Dmca (dmca@ev1.net); 
'nugezpa3@yahoo.com'
        Cc: (support@phil-flash.com); 'Erin'
        Subject: PF - trpery.com

         

        NOTICE of COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

        Greg Perks

        PO Box 3859
        Phoenix, Arizona 85016

        Pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act  and the WIPO
(World Intellectual Property Organization)
(<http://lcweb.loc.gov/copyright/legislation/dmca.pdf>), this letter
serves as actual notice of infringement in the event of legal
proceedings.

         

        Steve Easton is a DMCA agent, NOT an attorney. On behalf of the
owner of  exclusive right to the  material at issue in this notice, I
hereby state that I have a good faith belief that use of the material in
the manner complained of is not authorized by the  owner, its agent, or
the law. I hereby state, under penalty of perjury under the laws of the
United States, that the information in this notification is accurate,
and under penalty of perjury, that the complaining party is authorized
to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is being
infringed as set out in this notification.
